songs.title: SINCE THE STORM [SLICK]
songs.lyrics:
Ever love somebody so much it hurt
Drugs in your body so much it worked
Thought you was ready for it now can’t be sure
Used to see it perfect now it’s a blur
Sent from heaven just to give me a curse
Dancing with the devil find me a cure
Smoking heavy till I speak with a slur
Hold me steady I can’t sleep at it’s worst
Still aggressive all these meds got me raging
Guess there’s no rest for the sick and impatient
Laying in my bed wishing that I could be brainless
One day I’ll be dead don’t say you tried to save me
Only pick up for a plug or a bankroll
You know he a scrub he gon run when I say so
Why you acting sus miss?
Calls from a pay phone
Shorty got the drugs if she want we could take those
Shit ain’t been the same since the storm last year
Can’t look at your face when I hold back tears
Can’t control the impulses make me heartless
No matter what you feel imma get this shit regardless
If I want a different way would you come?
I’ve been praying every night for the day I see the sun
